name: Thruster-82 Turmoil
description:
Created by Emma Ebeling

Modifications made:

  • Coded a super primitive dialogue system
  • Changed all enemy models
    • changed key model 
  • Added a mini story
  • Altered level one and level 2, added a third level
    • Altered style of level one
    • Made level 2 more of a base for a level than a full level
      • more for style than for challenge
    • Added level 3 
      • altered light system to be more of a flashlight/area light
  • Modified lighting system in level 3
